channel.title: Python on Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Analytics

item.title: Airflow: combining best of R and Python
item.description: You might know it from any engineering job, you look for quick solution of your problem but the only available solution was created in other progrming language. While many engineers need to create solution themselves data related jobs do not usually have much limitation regarding to what technology they can use. So you often adopt strategy of using whatever makes the job. Most of data scientist then limit their choices for R and Python.
